alert.note: Alert for Creek; Osage; Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 9:51PM CDT until July 28 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN OSAGE...NORTHEASTERN CREEK AND TULSA COUNTIES... At 950 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Sperry, moving east at 25 mph. Another severe thunderstorm was near Sand Springs. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Tulsa... Broken Arrow... Sand Springs... Owasso... Bixby... Jenks... Skiatook... Catoosa... Collinsville... Sperry... Keystone State Park... Jenks Riverside Airport... Turley... Tulsa International Airport... Gray... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 210 and 232. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
